scripts.version: json -I -f assets/manifest.json -e "this.version='`json -f package.json version`'" && git add assets/manifest.json
scripts.chrome-manifest: mkdirp dist && json -e "delete this.applications;" < assets/manifest.json > dist/manifest.json
scripts.chrome-build: npm run chrome-manifest && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --display-error-details
scripts.chrome-pack: npm run chrome-build && mkdirp out && zip -r out/chrome-github-toolkit-$npm_package_version.zip dist
scripts.chrome-open: npm run chrome-build && npm run chrome-launch --
scripts.firefox-build: npm run firefox-manifest && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --display-error-details
scripts.firefox-pack: npm run firefox-build && mkdirp out && zip -rj out/firefox-github-toolkit-$npm_package_version.zip dist/
scripts.firefox-open: npm run firefox-build && npm run firefox-launch --
scripts.clean: if [ -e dist ]; then rm -r dist/; fi && if [ -e out ]; then rm -r out/; fi
